Package de.htw.battleship

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
de.htw.battleship.Vector2d
de.htw.battleship.Ship
public class Ship
extends Vector2d
An instance of this class holds all information to render and identify a ship on a game board. Additionally, it can be exported as a string.

      x - The x coordinate of the starting point
      y - The y coordinate of the starting point

      horizontal - The orientation of the ship

    • Ship

      public Ship​(Vector2d position, int shipLength, boolean horizontal)
      Generate new ship with given values for the starting position, ship length and orientation
      Parameters:
      position - A Vector2d representing the position of the starting point
      shipLength - The length of the ship
      horizontal - The orientation of the ship
